Sentencas: Planar solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) are considered to be power generators with high efficiency and low emission at small power units (1-200 kW(el)).
Titulo: Area specific resistance of oxide scales grown on ferritic alloys for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: Many prototype systems are already successfully realized.
Titulo: Area specific resistance of oxide scales grown on ferritic alloys for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: For mass production the costs have to be reduced and the long-term stability has to be enhanced.
Titulo: Area specific resistance of oxide scales grown on ferritic alloys for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: Power losses <0.5%/1000 h is the target value for stacks in stationary SOFC-based power systems.
Titulo: Area specific resistance of oxide scales grown on ferritic alloys for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: To reach this goal, the factors influencing degradation have to be found and reduced.
Titulo: Area specific resistance of oxide scales grown on ferritic alloys for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: In this work the interaction between interconnect and different ceramic materials such as perovskites (La0.8Sr0.2(Mn,Co)O-3. La0.65Sr0.3MnO3, La0.65Sr0.3(Mn,Co)O-3) and spinels (Mn(Co,Fe)O-4, (Cu,Ni)Mn2O4) was investigated on the cathode (air) side of conventional ferritic interconnect materials (CroFer22APU, ITMLC, ZMG232L).
Titulo: Area specific resistance of oxide scales grown on ferritic alloys for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: The method to determine the value of the area specific resistance between interconnect and contact layer (R-#ICC) within a tolerance of 10% has been developed to provide reliable data for ASR values and their degradation.
Titulo: Area specific resistance of oxide scales grown on ferritic alloys for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: The R-#ICC-value increases with annealing time.
Titulo: Area specific resistance of oxide scales grown on ferritic alloys for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: The degree of this increase depends on used materials and their combination.
Titulo: Area specific resistance of oxide scales grown on ferritic alloys for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: The spinel contact layers form a thin dense ceramic layer at the beginning of the annealing process.
Titulo: Area specific resistance of oxide scales grown on ferritic alloys for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: This layer reduces the oxidation rate of the alloy.
Titulo: Area specific resistance of oxide scales grown on ferritic alloys for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: The degradation in a stack has been determined from the R-#ICC-values and geometric factors.
